ComicInfo.Summary:
Black Dahlia
The Black Dahlia is one of the most famous unsolved crimes of the twentieth century. Some experts think she was murdered by a serial killer. Others think it was a crime of passion. As a modern day investigator digs deeper into the case she uncovers the sinister truth behind the case...and comes to wish she had headed the cryptic warnings to leave it alone.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Eric J & Mohan Sivakami | 1 | B | Cover B | Daniel Leister & Vinicius Andrade | 2 | C | Cover C | Richard Ortiz & Ylenia DiNapoli | 3 | D | WonderCon Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Sabine Rich | Missing | E | In-Store Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Keith Garvey | Missing | F | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Keith Garvey | Missing | G | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Derlis Santacruz (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
